text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses Pre-emptive Rights in Section 1, stating: \"§ 15 GmbHG \u2013 Pre‑emptive rights on new capital contributions: Any existing shareholder has a statutory right to subscribe to new shares in proportion to his current shareholding (unless the shareholders expressly waive it).\" It further suggests leveraging this statutory right in negotiations, satisfying the criterion.", "criterion_id": "70dc71a1-e038-48fe-912b-61afa9315b10"}
